content.text:
HON. LUIS V. GUTIERREZ

                              of illinois

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 1, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. GUTIERREZ. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably absent in the House 
chamber for Roll Call vote 591 on Tuesday, October 31, 2017. Had I been 
present, I would have voted Yea on Roll Call vote 591.
content.speaker: Mr. GUTIERREZ
